foods.name: Pasta Carbonara
foods.description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and grated cheese together.
In a large pan, sauté the diced pancetta or guanciale until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook briefly.
Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the pan with the pancetta. Toss to coat the pasta in the fat.
Remove the pan from the heat and quickly pour in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring continuously to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese on top.

foods.name: Chicken Curry
foods.description: A flavorful and aromatic Indian chicken curry.
instructions: In a large pot, heat vegetable oil and sauté chopped onions until soft and translucent.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, and cook for a minute until fragrant.
Add curry powder, turmeric, cumin, coriander, and chili powder. Stir well to coat the onions and spices.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft and mushy.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until they are browned on all sides.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat, cover the pot, and simmer for about 30 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and tender.
Adjust salt and spices according to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with steamed rice or naan bread.

foods.name: Greek Salad
foods.description: A refreshing and healthy Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large bowl, combine chopped tomatoes, diced cucumbers, sliced red onion, and Kalamata olives.
In a separate small bowl, whisk together extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to combine.
Add crumbled feta cheese on top and gently mix.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or light meal.

foods.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
foods.description: Classic chocolate chip cookies that are soft and chewy on the inside and crispy on the outside.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, cream together softened butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, mixing until just combined.
Stir in the semisweet chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving enough space between each cookie.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
Remove from the oven and let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
